txt.en: Your group is using the Round Robin loot rule with Need/Greed/Pass choices. Every corpse will be assigned to a specific player in the group to loot. The game will select that player by going down the list of group members one at a time and restarting at the top of the list when everyone has been given a corpse to loot. Any items of or above the 'Loot Quality' level set by the group leader will have an option to pass or roll on the item based on need for the item or just greed. Once everyone has made their choice, those who chose Need will roll for a chance to obtain the item. If no player chose Need, those that chose Greed will roll on the item.

Any items of or above the 'Loot Quality' level set by the fellowship leader will have an option to pass or roll on the item based on need for the item or just greed. Once everyone has made their choice, those who chose Need will roll for a chance to obtain the item. If no player chose Need, those that chose Greed will roll on the item.
